SEARCH
Package com.example.aurora.notifications

Class NotificationHelper

java.lang.Object
android.content.Context
android.content.ContextWrapper
com.example.aurora.notifications.NotificationHelper
public class NotificationHelper extends android.content.ContextWrapper
Helper class for creating and managing notification channels and building notifications for the Aurora app.

This wrapper ensures that a notification channel exists (Android O+), and provides a clean API for building notifications with a title, message, and optional tap intent.
